title: Senior Manager Accounts Receivable - Europe
content:
About Us
With electric vehicles expected to be nearly 30% of new vehicle sales by 2025 and more than 50% by 2040, electric mobility is becoming a reality. ChargePoint (NYSE: CHPT) is at the center of this revolution, powering one of the world’s leading EV charging networks and a comprehensive set of hardware, software and mobile solutions for every charging need across North America and Europe. We bring together drivers, businesses, automakers, policymakers, utilities and other stakeholders to make e-mobility a global reality.
Since our founding in 2007, ChargePoint has focused solely on making the transition to electric easy for businesses, fleets and drivers. ChargePoint offers a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to create an all-electric future and a trillion-dollar market.
At ChargePoint, we foster a positive and productive work environment by committing to live our values of Be Courageous, Charge Together, Love our Customers, Operate with Openness, and Relentlessly Pursue Awesome. These values guide how we show up every day, align, and work together to build a brighter future for all of us.
Join the team that is building the EV charging industry and make your mark on how people and goods will get everywhere they need to go, in any context, for generations to come.
Discover what it’s like to help build the fueling network of the future - check out our Engineering Blog.
What You Will Be Doing
As an AR Senior Manager Europe, you are responsible for the European order to cash (OTC) process covering 7 European entities and several currencies. Your portfolio includes different types of revenue flows for hardware, software subscriptions, professional services and transactions-based billings. The day-to-day credit approvals, billings, collections and cash applications will be done by your team and supported by the global billing and cash app team. You will support them by ensuring:

Interacting with the key European customers and business partners
Assign credit limits based on the risk analyses of your team members
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align and optimise OTC process flows
Manage the international EU AR team of approximately 4–7 employees based in 3 different European countries and India
You are part of global operating accounting team of about 100 employees

What You Will Bring to ChargePoint

Operational management skills to manage the order to cash flow process
The flexibility to manage a team in multiple different time zones, and with different cultural back-grounds
Strong organisation skills to optimise complex order flows and resolutions of credit situations

Requirements

10+ years relevant experience in an accounting or OTC role for an international operating company
Proven people-management experience.
Strong communication skills to communicate with customers and internal stakeholders
An educational background in accounting or business economics
Identify and create necessary business process to increase efficiencies
Ability to set the right priorities
Hands-on mentality when required
Basic knowledge about VAT

Preferred

Experience in working with NetSuite, Salesforce or D&B
Experience in working in an US-based public company
Experience in an EV company with roaming or other transaction-based revenue

Location
This hybrid (remote and in-office) role is based in our European headquarters in Amsterdam
We are committed to an inclusive and diverse team. ChargePoint is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based on race, color, ethnicity, ancestry, national origin, religion, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, marital status or any legally protected status.
If there is a match between your experiences/skills and the Company needs, we will contact you directly.
ChargePoint is an equal opportunity employer. Applicants only - Recruiting agencies do not contact.
